name: SeatCrunch
overview:
Founded in 2012, SeatCrunch was created as a platform to help fans obtain the tickets they want, or sell the tickets they don’t. We are proud to offer a service that is not only convenient and helpful, but honest and respectful.

The price of your tickets shouldn’t increase once you’ve decided to buy them. That’s why you’ll never be surprised by hidden fees like “service charges” or “handling fees” on our site. At SeatCrunch we offer you one single price that stays the same throughout your buying experience. On top of that, we provide real customer service across multiple platforms: over the phone, via email or through our live chat client.

A few things you should know about SeatCrunch:

We are human. We have attended hundreds of events all around the nation, and understand what fans truly want. We also know quite a bit about the teams, concerts and venues we sell tickets to. If you have questions about the tickets you’re buying, chances are we’ll be able to answer them.

We guarantee your satisfaction with our product. We can’t always promise that your team will win, but we can promise that the tickets you buy are authentic, will be delivered on time and are priced competitively. We can also promise that we don’t apply annoying hidden fees to your purchase. Feel safe and secure when you buy your concert tickets, theater tickets, nfl tickets, nba tickets or mlb tickets from SeatCrunch.

We care about your safety. We understand the concerns you may have about placing your credit card information on the internet. To help protect our customers we have a secure site with extended validation from industry leader VeriSign, enabled with a 128-bit encryption to make sure all sensitive information is protected. Your information will never leave our server. If you want to learn more about our exceptional business practices, visit our Better Business Bureau page, where you will see that we have earned an A rating.

We have real experience. SeatCrunch is proudly owned and operated by Best Tickets, whose corporate office is in San Antonio, Texas. Best Tickets has helped hundreds of thousands of fans find event tickets throughout the world for the last two decades. The excellent customer service provided by Best Tickets carries over to all of its subsidiaries. SeatCrunch is proud to be part of the Best Tickets family.

If you have any questions at all, please feel free to contact us during normal business hours at 1-800-776-9488, email us at support@seatcrunch.com or use our live chat feature.
